rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with ample storage and display area. Ensures smooth flow and adheres to Vastu principles by welcoming positive energy.
Mediterranean style living room with natural light, large windows facing east for morning sun as per Vastu guidelines, and modern Mediterranean decor.
Dining area integrated with the living space; designed to promote social interaction while following local building norms for ventilation.
Modern Mediterranean kitchen equipped with high-end appliances and an open layout that enhances natural light. Adheres to Vastu guidelines by positioning it in the southeast zone.
Guest bedroom with a built-in wardrobe and ample seating area ensuring comfort. Vastu compliant location to maintain positive energy.
Master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, offering privacy, Mediterranean style interiors and strategic placement according to Vastu principles.
En-suite bathroom for the master bedroom. Design includes water features that align with Vastu recommendations for positive flow of energy.
Quiet study room positioned away from the noisy areas and in a quiet zone as per local building norms.

openings.description: Main entrance designed to welcome positive energy; following Vastu guidelines by facing north.
Large windows on the east side of living room to allow morning sunlight as per Vastu norms.
Window in kitchen for ventilation and natural light, adhering to local norms and Vastu recommendations.
Garage entrance located on the north-west corner to maintain seamless connectivity with the ground floor and facilitate two-car garage access.

amenities.description: Outdoor Mediterranean style swimming pool with a deck area for relaxation and family gatherings.
Home theater designed in the west wing of the penthouse, equipped with modern audio-visual technology and ambient lighting.
Sufficient space for two cars, integrated into the design with easy access and adherence to local building norms.

external_features.description: landscaped garden area for relaxation and outdoor activities. Designed in Mediterranean style with native plants.
